name: Scarpa Vapor V Climbing Shoes
description: With small edges and a stiff midsole, this shoe will help you immensely with your climbing experience.

name: Arc'teryx Skaha Harness
description: Highly breathable harness with flexible cords and straps to ensure a comfortable belay climbing experience.

name: Petzl GriGri Belay Device
description: The newest in GriGri, this camming device can accommodate ropes as thin as 8.5mm.

name: MEC Edge Chalk Bag
description: The perfect choice for your next climbing session.

name: La Sportiva Genius Climbing Shoes
description: With a precise fit and an edgeless sole, there is tons of smearing potential to be had.

name: Scarpa Drago XT Climbing Shoes
description: The Scarpa Drago XT is the latest in Scarpa climbing shoes, sure to boost your climbing skills.

name: Scarpa Instinct VSR Climbing Shoes
description: A shoe designed with lighter climbers in mind, great for steep routes and training sessions.

name: Evolv Phantom Pro LV Climbing Shoes
description: Evolv's most aggressive shoe yet, great for staying on tiny footholds and dynamic movements.

name: Petzl Corax Harness
description: A great harness for both top-rope and lead climbing.
